Reviews.Title: “A Place to Crash”
Reviews.Author: Arl7
Reviews.Content: hotel unimpressive front staff beds extremely hard peoples hair bedding shower head set low husband 5ft 9 stoop shower water pressure little constant spit positive continental breakfast ok parking availability leaving car site cruise complimentary shuttle cruise pier convenient minutes pier

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay pre/post cruise!”
Reviews.Author: Herbieluvbug
Reviews.Content: price excellent value little dated clean poolhot tub nice continental breakfast included nice gentleman runs free shuttle ship walking distance little shops restaurants definitely recommend cruise hesitate stay value money san pedro

Reviews.Title: “No Complaints”
Reviews.Author: BB_Kiddo1
Reviews.Content: stayed nights wedding street perfect location walk eat drink attend reception werent exactly spectacular clean value price pool grounds kept service suited fine stay

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive-as well it should be”
Reviews.Author: VijogeJoliet_ILUSA
Reviews.Content: stayed sunrise hotel night precruise purchased king nonsmoking hotelscom 79 arrived 10 am due flight dest clerk hadnt cleaned check king smoking double queen opted king smoking experience hotels especially smoke smell doesnt bother desk clerk commented usually charge additional money checkin wouldnt charge time aware extend courtesy time stay assigned 127 floor view pool door overpowering smell stale cigarrette smoke obvious fault okd smelled stench hotel ive stayed immediately windows fan hours smell gone sized king bed mini fridge tv couple chairs desk free wifi noted stains arms upholstered chair carpet hard tell permanent stains dirty noticed lot cobwebs corners near floor king bed postage stamp sized pillows pleasant sleep bag potato chips continental breakfast free probably embarrassed charge drank cup coffee restaurant door eat husband noticed shirt wrinkled suitcase couldnt iron hotel brochure decided follow time honored practice steaming shower water extremely hot nice steam minutes bathroom door remove shirt steam set smoke detector funny called wasnt fire free wifi shuttle cruise port nice time ill stay elsewhere probably airport

Reviews.Title: “Good location for cruise ships”
Reviews.Author: Mike_Stooch
Reviews.Content: clean hotel located near cruise ship terminal overnight stay cruise youre staying couple days choose elsewhere located busy road guest laundry beds comfortable included continental breakfast buffet nice bonus

HotelInfo.Name: Sunrise Hotel San Pedro
HotelInfo.Address: 525 South Harbor Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90731 (Formerly Best Western Sunrise Hotel)
